analyzed: 如是我聞。一時佛在迦毘羅城大精舍中。與
translated: Thus have I heard. Once, the Buddha was in the great monastery of Kapilavastu, together with
an innumerable assembly of great bhikṣus.

original: 復有無量百千億那由他菩薩摩訶薩。
analyzed: 復有無量百千億那由他菩薩摩訶薩。
translated: There were also innumerable hundreds of thousands of koṭis of nayutas of bodhisattva-mahāsattvas.

original: 其名曰除一切蓋障菩薩。
analyzed: 其名曰除一切蓋障菩薩。
translated: Their names were: Bodhisattva Who Removes All Obstructions,

original: 執金剛主菩薩。🔽觀世音菩薩。🔽文殊師利菩薩。
analyzed: 執金剛主菩薩。 觀世音菩薩。 文殊師利菩薩。
translated: Bodhisattva Vajrapāṇi,🔽Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva,🔽Mañjuśrī Bodhisattva,
Samantabhadra Bodhisattva,
Akṣayamati Bodhisattva,
Maitreya Bodhisattva.
Such were the foremost ones.

original: 復有無量天龍夜叉乾闥婆阿修羅迦樓羅緊那羅摩睺羅伽人非人等。
analyzed: 復有無量天龍夜叉乾闥婆阿修羅迦樓羅緊那羅摩睺羅伽人非人等。
translated: There were also innumerable devas, nāgas, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kiṃnaras, mahoragas, humans, non-humans, and others.

original: 無量大眾恭敬圍遶而為說法。
analyzed: 無量大眾恭敬圍遶而為說法。
translated: The innumerable great assembly respectfully surrounded him and he expounded the Dharma for them.
At that time, in the city there was a great brāhman
named Kapila-jana.
He turned to non-Buddhist paths and did not believe in the Buddha's teachings.
There was a skilled physiognomist who told him:

original: 大婆羅門汝却後七日必當命終。
analyzed: 大婆羅門汝却後七日必當命終。
translated: Great Brahmin, after seven days, you will surely die.
When the Brahmin heard these words,
he was filled with sorrow, fear, and terror.

original: 作是思惟誰能救我我當依誰。
analyzed: 作是思惟誰能救我我當依誰。
translated: He thought, Who can save me? Whom should I rely on?

original: 復作是念沙門瞿曇稱一切智證一切智。
analyzed: 復作是念沙門瞿曇稱一切智證一切智。
translated: He further thought, The śramaṇa Gautama is said to be omniscient and to have realized omniscience.
I shall go to him.
If he is truly omniscient,
he will surely tell me about my worries and fears.
Having had this thought, he went to where the Buddha was.
In front of the assembly, he looked at the Tathāgata from afar.
He wanted to ask questions but was hesitant.

original: 時釋迦如來於三世法無不明見。
analyzed: 時釋迦如來於三世法無不明見。
translated: At that time, Śākyamuni Tathāgata, who was clear and all-seeing in the Dharma of the three times,
knew what the Brahmin was thinking.
With a compassionate and gentle voice, he said to him:

original: 大婆羅門汝却後七日定當命終。
analyzed: 大婆羅門汝却後七日定當命終。
translated: Great Brahmin, after seven days, you will definitely die.

original: 墮可畏處阿鼻地獄從此復入十六地獄。
analyzed: 墮可畏處阿鼻地獄從此復入十六地獄。
translated: Falling into the terrifying place of Avīci Hell, and from there entering the sixteen hells.
Having emerged, he will again receive the body of an outcaste.
After death, he will be reborn among pigs.
Always dwelling in foul mud, constantly eating filth.
Living a long life, he will experience much suffering.
Later, he will be born as a human, poor and lowly.
Unclean, foul-smelling, with an ugly form, thin and dark.
A patient with dry, withered leprosy, unpleasant to see.
His throat like a needle, always lacking food and drink.
Obtaining beatings from others, experiencing great suffering and distress.
At that time, the brāhman, having heard these words,
gave rise to great terror, wept sorrowfully and anxiously,
hurried to where the Buddha was, bowed his head at the Buddha's feet,

original: 而白佛言如來即是救濟一切諸眾生者。
analyzed: 而白佛言如來即是救濟一切諸眾生者。
translated: and said to the Buddha, The Tathāgata is the one who saves and delivers all sentient beings.
I now repent and take refuge in the World-Honored One.
I only pray that you will save me from the suffering of the great hells.

original: 佛言大婆羅門此迦毘羅城三岐道處有古佛塔。
analyzed: 佛言大婆羅門此迦毘羅城三岐道處有古佛塔。
translated: The Buddha said, Great brāhman, at the three-way intersection in the city of Kapilavastu there is an ancient buddha stūpa.
The Tathāgata's relics are presently enshrined there.

original: 其塔崩壞汝應往彼重更修理。
analyzed: 其塔崩壞汝應往彼重更修理。
translated: The stūpa has collapsed. You should go there to repair it again.
And create a dharma-wheel finial and write the dhāraṇī.
Place it inside and make great offerings.
Recite the divine mantra seven times according to the method.
It will cause your life-force to be restored and increase.
After a long time, when your life ends, you will be reborn in the Land of Ultimate Bliss.
For a hundred thousand kalpas, you will experience great and supreme bliss.
Next, in the world of Wonderful Joy,
for a hundred thousand kalpas, you will receive bliss as before.
Later, in the palaces of the Tuṣita heavens,
for a hundred thousand kalpas, you will continuously experience bliss.
In all your lives, you will always remember your past lives.
You will eliminate all hindrances and destroy all sins.
You will forever part from all the sufferings of the hells and so forth.

original: 常見諸佛恒為如來之所攝護。
analyzed: 常見諸佛恒為如來之所攝護。
translated: You will always see the buddhas and will always be protected by the Tathāgata.

original: 婆羅門若有比丘比丘尼優婆塞優婆夷善男女等。
analyzed: 婆羅門若有比丘比丘尼優婆塞優婆夷善男女等。
translated: Brahmin, if there are bhikṣus, bhikṣuṇīs, upāsakas, upāsikās, good men and good women,
Some have short lives, and some have many illnesses.
They should repair old stupas or build small clay stupas.
Relying on the Dharma, write out the dharani spells.
Use the spells to make a rope and set up an altar.
By this merit, those whose lives are about to end
Will have their lives extended again.
Those who are suffering from illness will all be cured.
Forever free from hell, animal realms, and hungry ghost realms.
The ears will not even hear the sounds of hell.
How much less will the body experience it?

original: 時婆羅門聞此語已心懷歡喜。
analyzed: 時婆羅門聞此語已心懷歡喜。
translated: When the brahmin heard this, he was overjoyed.

original: 即欲往彼故壞塔所依教修營。
analyzed: 即欲往彼故壞塔所依教修營。
translated: He wanted to go to the site of the ruined stupa to repair it according to the teachings.
At that time, in the assembly, Bodhisattva Sarva-shvara

translated: rose from his seat, joined his palms, and said to the Buddha, World-Honored One,
What is that dharani method?
Which can increase the roots of merit and goodness?
The Buddha said, There is a great dharani

original: 名最勝無垢清淨光明大壇場法。
analyzed: 名最勝無垢清淨光明大壇場法。
translated: Called the supreme, immaculate, pure light great altar method.
The buddhas use this to comfort sentient beings.
If there are those who hear this dhāraṇī,
They will destroy the sins of the five heinous crimes and close the gates to hell.
They will eliminate the sinful defilements of stinginess, greed, and jealousy.
Those with short lifespans will all attain longevity.
There will be no obstacles to all auspicious matters.

original: 時除蓋障菩薩復白佛言。
analyzed: 時除蓋障菩薩復白佛言。
translated: At that time, Bodhisattva Remover of Obstructions again addressed the Buddha, saying,

original: 世尊願佛說此陀羅尼法。
analyzed: 世尊願佛說此陀羅尼法。
translated: World-Honored One, I only wish that the Buddha would explain this dhāraṇī method,
So that all sentient beings may attain long life,
Purify all their karmic hindrances,
And become a great light for all sentient beings.
At that time, the World-Honored One, having heard this request,
Emitted a great radiance from the crown of his head,
Illuminating the trichiliocosm,
And arousing all the Tathāgatas.
It then returned to its original place and entered through the crown of the Buddha's head.

If one wishes to perform this method,
one should do it on the eighth day of the month, or the thirteenth day,

analyzed: 右遶舍利塔滿七十七匝。

analyzed: 誦此陀羅尼亦七十七遍。
translated: Recite this dhāraṇī also seventy-seven times.
One should make an altar and purify oneself on it.
Copy this mantra seventy-seven times.
Out of respect for the Dharma, to the person who copies it,
with fragrant flowers, food and drink, clean clothes, bathing,
anointing with perfume, and incense, make offerings.
Either give the seven treasures or give according to one's ability.

original: 當持呪本置於塔中供養此塔。
analyzed: 當持呪本置於塔中供養此塔。
translated: Take the original mantra and place it in the stūpa, making offerings to this stūpa.

analyzed: 或作小泥塔滿足七十七。
translated: Or make small clay stūpas, completing seventy-seven.

analyzed: 各以一本置於塔中而興供養如法作已。
translated: Each should be placed in a stupa and offerings made. Having done so in accordance with the Dharma,
The life of one whose life is about to end will be extended.

original: 一切宿障諸惡趣業悉皆滅盡。
analyzed: 一切宿障諸惡趣業悉皆滅盡。
translated: All karmic hindrances from past lives and evil destinies will be completely eradicated.
One will forever be free from the hells, hungry ghosts, and animals.
Wherever one is born, one will always remember past lives.
All wishes will be fulfilled.

original: 則為已得七十七億諸如來所而種善根。
analyzed: 則為已得七十七億諸如來所而種善根。
translated: One will have already planted wholesome roots under 77 koṭīs of Tathāgatas.

original: 一切眾病及諸煩惱咸得消除。
analyzed: 一切眾病及諸煩惱咸得消除。
translated: All illnesses and afflictions will be completely eliminated.
If a person is gravely ill and about to die,
One should make a square altar for them.

original: 於上畫作種種形狀所謂輪形金剛杵形蠡形戟形月字形蓮花形四角畫蓮花上安瓶瓶滿香水置於四角。

Arrange incense burners and burn various famous fragrances.

original: 以五色鉢盛種種食及三白食謂乳酪粳米飯復以五鉢各盛香花水及粳米壇上供養。

translated: Use five-colored bowls to hold various foods and the three white foods, namely milk, yogurt, and glutinous rice. Also, use five bowls to each hold fragrant flowers, water, and glutinous rice. Set up offerings on the altar.
Fill a vessel with various foods and drinks.
And place a bottle of water in the center of the altar.

original: 於壇近邊畫作毘那夜迦像。
analyzed: 於壇近邊畫作毘那夜迦像。
translated: Draw an image of Vinayaka near the altar.
Place a lamp on top.
Have the patient sit to the west of the altar.
Facing this altar.

original: 盛一器食對病人前置於壇上。
analyzed: 盛一器食對病人前置於壇上。
translated: Fill a vessel with food and place it on the altar in front of the patient.
The mantra practitioner must be pure and in accordance with the Dharma.
Recite this mantra seventy-seven times for this patient.
Cause the dying person to be confused and dazed for seven days.

original: 命續識還如從夢覺。🔽若有護淨日別一遍。
analyzed: 命續識還如從夢覺。 若有護淨日別一遍。
translated: Their life will continue and their consciousness will return, as if waking from a dream.🔽If one purifies oneself daily and recites this mantra once,
And recites it for a full hundred years,
This person will be reborn in the Land of Ultimate Bliss upon death.
If one always recites it at all times,
Up until enlightenment, they will always remember their past lives.
Forever free from premature death and all evil destinies.

original: 若復有人為於亡者稱其名字。
analyzed: 若復有人為於亡者稱其名字。
translated: If there are people who, for the sake of the deceased, call their name,
And recite the mantra with utmost sincerity for 77 times,
If the deceased has fallen into an evil destiny,

original: 應時即得離惡道苦生天受樂。
analyzed: 應時即得離惡道苦生天受樂。
translated: They will immediately be freed from the suffering of the evil paths and be reborn in the heavens to enjoy bliss.

original: 或稱彼名依法書寫此陀羅尼。
analyzed: 或稱彼名依法書寫此陀羅尼。
translated: Or by calling their name, write this dhāraṇī according to the Dharma,
Place it in a Buddha stupa and make offerings according to the Dharma,

original: 亦令亡者得離惡趣生於天上。
analyzed: 亦令亡者得離惡趣生於天上。
translated: It will also enable the deceased to be freed from evil destinies and be reborn in the heavens.
Or they may be reborn in Tuṣita Heaven,
Up to enlightenment, not falling into evil destinies.
If there are good men and good women,

analyzed: 於此佛塔或右遶或禮拜或供養者。
translated: Who circumambulate this Buddha stupa to the right, pay homage, or make offerings,

analyzed: 當得授記於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提而不退轉。
translated: They will attain the prediction of irreversibility from supreme, perfect enlightenment.

original: 一切宿障一切罪業悉皆消滅。
analyzed: 一切宿障一切罪業悉皆消滅。
translated: All past hindrances and all evil karma will be completely eradicated.
They will not fall into the realms of flying birds or animals.

original: 至此塔影當得永離畜生惡趣。
analyzed: 至此塔影當得永離畜生惡趣。
translated: When the shadow of this stupa reaches, one will forever be free from the evil destinies of the animal realm.

original: 若有五無間罪或在塔影。
analyzed: 若有五無間罪或在塔影。
translated: If one with the five heinous offenses is in the shadow of the stupa,
or touches the stupa, all will be eradicated.

analyzed: 置塔之處無諸邪魅夜叉羅剎。
translated: Where the stupa is placed, there will be no evil spirits, yakshas, rakshasas,

analyzed: 亦無魍魎諸惡鬼神奪精氣者。

analyzed: 亦無刀兵水火霜雹饑饉。
translated: There will also be no weapons, fire, frost, hail, famine,

analyzed: 橫死惡夢不祥苦惱之事。
translated: sudden death, evil dreams, inauspicious events, or suffering and distress.

analyzed: 於彼國土若有諸惡先相現時。
translated: In that country, if there are any evil signs that appear,

analyzed: 其塔即便現於神變出大光焰。

translated: It will also be as if they have made offerings to 99 kotis of hundreds of thousands of nayutas of Ganges river sands of stupa relics.

analyzed: 是則成就廣大善根福德之聚。
translated: This will then accomplish a vast accumulation of wholesome roots and blessings and virtues.

original: 若有比丘於月八日十三日。
analyzed: 若有比丘於月八日十三日。
translated: If there are bhikshus on the eighth day, the thirteenth day,
the fourteenth day, and the fifteenth day of the month,
Bathe, maintain purity, and wear fresh clean clothes.
For one day and one night, do not eat or drink.
Sometimes only eat the three kinds of white food.

original: 右繞佛塔誦此陀羅尼滿一百八遍。
analyzed: 右繞佛塔誦此陀羅尼滿一百八遍。
translated: Circumambulate the Buddha's stupa to the right and recite this dhāraṇī 108 times.

original: 百千劫罪及五無間皆得除滅。
analyzed: 百千劫罪及五無間皆得除滅。
translated: The sins of a hundred thousand kalpas and the five heinous crimes will all be eradicated.
I, Nivāraṇaviṣkambhin, will manifest my body and
cause all their wishes to be fulfilled.
They will be able to see all the buddhas and tathāgatas.

original: 若有誦滿二百八遍得諸禪定。
analyzed: 若有誦滿二百八遍得諸禪定。
translated: If one recites it 208 times, they will attain various meditative absorptions.
If one recites it 308 times,
they will attain the samādhi of purifying all hindrances.
If one recites it 408 times,

original: 得四大天王常來親近現身衛護。
analyzed: 得四大天王常來親近現身衛護。
translated: the Four Heavenly Kings will always come and befriend them, manifesting their bodies to guard them.
They will increase their physical and mental power and increase their great authority.
If one recites it 508 times,

original: 攝得無量阿僧祇不可量諸大善根。
analyzed: 攝得無量阿僧祇不可量諸大善根。
translated: they will be able to gather immeasurable asaṃkhyeya incalculable great wholesome roots.
If one recites it 608 times,
One will then attain the accomplishment of the fundamental method of this mantra.
One will become a mantra-holding celestial immortal.
If one recites it 708 times,
one will attain great majestic virtue and be endowed with radiance.

original: 若有誦滿八百八遍得心清淨。
analyzed: 若有誦滿八百八遍得心清淨。
translated: If one recites it 808 times, one will attain mental purity.

original: 若有誦滿九百八遍得五根清淨。
analyzed: 若有誦滿九百八遍得五根清淨。
translated: If one recites it 908 times, one will attain the purity of the five faculties.
If one recites it 1,008 times,
one will attain the fruit of stream-entry.

original: 若誦滿二千遍當得斯陀含果。
analyzed: 若誦滿二千遍當得斯陀含果。
translated: If one recites it 2,000 times, one will attain the fruit of once-returning.

original: 若誦滿三千遍當得阿那含果。
analyzed: 若誦滿三千遍當得阿那含果。
translated: If one recites it 3,000 times, one will attain the fruit of non-returning.

original: 若誦滿四千遍當得阿羅漢果。
analyzed: 若誦滿四千遍當得阿羅漢果。
translated: If one recites it 4,000 times, one will attain the fruit of arhatship.

original: 若誦滿五千遍當得辟支佛果。
analyzed: 若誦滿五千遍當得辟支佛果。
translated: If one recites it 5,000 times, one will attain the fruit of pratyekabuddhahood.

original: 若誦滿六千遍當得普賢地。
analyzed: 若誦滿六千遍當得普賢地。
translated: If one recites it 6,000 times, one will attain the stage of Samantabhadra.

original: 若誦滿七千遍當得初地。
analyzed: 若誦滿七千遍當得初地。
translated: If one recites it 7,000 times, one will attain the first ground.

original: 若滿八千遍當得第五地。
analyzed: 若滿八千遍當得第五地。
translated: If one recites it 8,000 times, one will attain the fifth ground.

original: 若滿九千遍當得普門陀羅尼。
analyzed: 若滿九千遍當得普門陀羅尼。
translated: If one recites it 9,000 times, one will attain the dhāraṇī of universal access.

original: 若滿十千遍當得不動地。
analyzed: 若滿十千遍當得不動地。
translated: If one recites it ten thousand times, one will attain the stage of immovability.

original: 若復滿十一千遍當得如來地。
analyzed: 若復滿十一千遍當得如來地。
translated: If one recites it eleven thousand times, one will attain the stage of the Tathāgata.

original: 成大人相大師子吼。🔽若復有人欲於現生。
analyzed: 成大人相大師子吼。 若復有人欲於現生。
translated: One will attain the major marks of a great man and roar like a great lion.
If there are people who wish to accomplish merit and great benefits in this life,

original: 應修故塔誦呪右遶滿百八遍。
analyzed: 應修故塔誦呪右遶滿百八遍。
translated: they should repair old stupas, recite the mantra, and circumambulate to the right one hundred and eight times.
All wishes in the mind will be fulfilled.

original: 時釋迦牟尼佛讚除蓋障言。
analyzed: 時釋迦牟尼佛讚除蓋障言。
translated: At that time, Śākyamuni Buddha praised Nivaranaviskambhin, saying,
Excellent, excellent, good man!

original: 汝能如是隨順如來所演呪法而助宣說。
analyzed: 汝能如是隨順如來所演呪法而助宣說。
translated: You are able to follow the mantra methods expounded by the Tathāgata and assist in their proclamation.
At that time, the great yakṣa lord Vajrapāṇi
addressed the Buddha, saying, World-Honored One,
this great mantra king dhāraṇī method
is the same as the Tathāgata's treasury and also like a Buddha's stūpa.

original: 世尊以此勝法鎮閻浮提。
analyzed: 世尊以此勝法鎮閻浮提。
translated: World-Honored One, with this supreme Dharma, you will stabilize Jambudvīpa
and enable all sentient beings to attain liberation.
You will be able to perform great Buddha-works in the future.
The Buddha said to Vajrapāṇi, the lord,🔽Good man,

original: 此大呪法若在世時同如來在。
analyzed: 此大呪法若在世時同如來在。
translated: If this great mantra method exists in the world, it is the same as the Tathagata being present.
Because it can do the work of the Buddha.
If one accomplishes a little, one creates a great accumulation of merit.
How much more so for the wholesome roots obtained through much effort.

original: 假使百千億那由他恒河沙諸佛說不能盡。
analyzed: 假使百千億那由他恒河沙諸佛說不能盡。
translated: Even if hundreds of thousands of koṭīs of nayutas of Ganges sands of Buddhas were to speak, they could not exhaust it.
What is seen by the Buddha's eye cannot be compared.
It cannot be measured, cannot be spoken of.
The Lord of the Vajra-wielders said:

original: 以何因緣少用功力成大福聚。
analyzed: 以何因緣少用功力成大福聚。
translated: For what reasons does one accomplish a great accumulation of merit with little effort?
The Buddha said: Listen carefully, I will explain it to you.

original: 若比丘比丘尼優婆塞優婆夷。
analyzed: 若比丘比丘尼優婆塞優婆夷。
translated: If there are bhikṣus, bhikṣuṇīs, upāsakas, or upāsikās.
Who wish to fulfill the great accumulation of merit.

original: 當依前法書寫此四大陀羅尼呪法之王各九十九本。
analyzed: 當依前法書寫此四大陀羅尼呪法之王各九十九本。
translated: They should rely on the previous method to copy these four great dhāraṇī mantra kings, each ninety-nine times.
Then, in front of a Buddha stūpa.
Build a square altar and smear cow dung on the ground.
Place full bottles of fragrant water in the four corners of the altar.
Arrange incense burners to make offerings.

original: 鉢盛香花水粳米置於壇上。
analyzed: 鉢盛香花水粳米置於壇上。
translated: Fill a bowl with fragrant flowers, water, and unhusked rice and place it on the altar.

original: 及三味食烏麻菉豆粳米和煮并三白食。
analyzed: 及三味食烏麻菉豆粳米和煮并三白食。
translated: And three kinds of food, black sesame, mung beans, and unhusked rice mixed and cooked, and three kinds of white food.
Each is placed in a bottle and spread on the altar.
Various fruits number ninety-nine.
And four kinds of food, all that is needed.
And various incense and flowers are all placed on top.

original: 以陀羅尼呪置相輪橖中及塔四周。
analyzed: 以陀羅尼呪置相輪橖中及塔四周。
translated: Using the dhāraṇī mantra, place it in the center of the相輪橖 and around the pagoda.
Using the method of the king of spells, place it inside the pagoda.

original: 想十方佛至心誦念此陀羅尼。
analyzed: 想十方佛至心誦念此陀羅尼。
translated: Contemplate the Buddhas of the ten directions and recite this dhāraṇī with utmost sincerity.
Then he spoke the mantra, saying:

original: 南謨納婆納伐底喃怛他揭多俱胝喃一弶伽捺地婆盧迦三摩喃二唵引三毘補麗毘末麗四鉢囉伐麗五市那上伐麗六薩囉薩囉七薩婆怛他揭多馱都揭鞞八薩底丁耶反地瑟恥帝薩引訶九阿引那夷我反下同咄都飯尼莎引訶十薩婆提婆那婆阿耶弭十一勃陀阿地瑟侘那上十二三摩也莎引訶十三應燒香相續誦此陀羅尼呪二十八遍。
analyzed: 南謨納婆納伐底喃怛他揭多俱胝喃一弶伽捺地婆盧迦三摩喃二唵引三毘補麗毘末麗四鉢囉伐麗五市那上伐麗六薩囉薩囉七薩婆怛他揭多馱都揭鞞八薩底丁耶反地瑟恥帝薩引訶九阿引那夷我反下同咄都飯尼莎引訶十薩婆提婆那婆阿耶弭十一勃陀阿地瑟侘那上十二三摩也莎引訶十三應燒香相續誦此陀羅尼呪二十八遍。
translated: Namo na-bhava-na-bhava-ta-nam-da-ta-gya-ku-ti-nam-jang-ga-na-ti-ba-lu-ka-sa-ma-nam-om-vi-pu-lei-vi-ma-lei-ba-la-va-lei-shi-na-va-lei-sa-la-sa-la-sa-ba-da-ta-gya-ta-tu-gya-vi-sa-ti-ti-ti-sa-ha-a-na-ya-du-tu-tu-ni-sa-ha-sa-ba-ti-ba-na-ba-a-ya-mi-bu-da-a-ti-sa-ta-na-sa-ma-ya-sa-ha-If one burns incense and continuously recites this dharani mantra twenty-eight times,

original: 即時八大菩薩八大夜叉王。
analyzed: 即時八大菩薩八大夜叉王。
translated: Then the eight great bodhisattvas and the eight great yaksha kings,
The vajra-holding yaksha lord,
The four heavenly kings, Indra, Brahma,
Narayana, Mahesvara,

original: 各以自手共持彼塔及相輪橖。
analyzed: 各以自手共持彼塔及相輪橖。
translated: Each with their own hands, will together hold the stupa and the umbrella-shaped spire.

original: 亦有九十九億百千那由他恒河沙諸佛。
analyzed: 亦有九十九億百千那由他恒河沙諸佛。
translated: There were also 99 billion trillion Ganges' sands of Buddhas.

original: 皆至此處加持彼塔。🔽安佛舍利由加持故。
analyzed: 皆至此處加持彼塔。 安佛舍利由加持故。
translated: All of them came to this place to empower that stupa.
By empowering the Buddha's relics, the stupa became like a great maṇi jewel.

original: 是人由此則為已造九十九億百千那由他諸大寶塔。
analyzed: 是人由此則為已造九十九億百千那由他諸大寶塔。
translated: This person thereby built 99 billion trillion great jeweled stupas.
Because of this, he will attain vast wholesome roots.
His lifespan will be prolonged and his body will be pure and free from defilements.
All illnesses will be eliminated and calamities and hindrances will be eradicated.
If one sees this stupa, the sins of the five heinous crimes will be extinguished.

original: 聞塔鈴聲消諸一切惡業。
analyzed: 聞塔鈴聲消諸一切惡業。
translated: Hearing the sound of the stupa bell will eliminate all evil karma.
After leaving this body, one will be born in the Land of Ultimate Bliss.

original: 若有傳聞此塔名者當得阿鞞跋致。
analyzed: 若有傳聞此塔名者當得阿鞞跋致。
translated: If there are those who hear the name of this stupa, they will attain irreversibility.
Even down to birds and beasts who hear its sound,
they will leave the animal realm and never receive it again.
They will attain a vast accumulation of blessings and virtues.

original: 若復有人欲得滿足六波羅蜜者。
analyzed: 若復有人欲得滿足六波羅蜜者。
translated: If there are people who wish to fulfill the six pāramitās,
One should make a square altar and first smear it with cow dung.
Then cover it with clean soil.
Sprinkle it with fragrant water, and smooth it with a clean cloth.
Place the five offering bowls on the altar.

original: 寫前四種陀羅尼呪各九十九本。
analyzed: 寫前四種陀羅尼呪各九十九本。
translated: Write the above four kinds of dhāraṇī spells, each ninety-nine times.
Make ninety-nine small stupas with your hands.
Place one copy in each of these stupas.

original: 其相輪呪還置小塔相輪橖中。
analyzed: 其相輪呪還置小塔相輪橖中。
translated: The spell for the parasol should be placed in the center of the small stupa's parasol.

original: 行列壇上以諸香花供養旋遶七遍。
analyzed: 行列壇上以諸香花供養旋遶七遍。
translated: Arrange them on the altar and make offerings of various incense and flowers, circumambulating seven times.
Recite this dhāraṇī:🔽Namo nārāyaṇāya Tathāgatāya Gaṅgānadīvālukākoṭīniyutaśatasahasra-saṃmitānāṃ sarvasattvānām

original: 南謨納婆納伐底喃怛他揭多一弶伽捺地婆盧迦二俱胝那庾多設多索訶薩囉喃三唵引四普怖哩五折里尼六折哩慕上哩忽哩七社邏跋上哩莎引訶八若依此法而受持者。
analyzed: 南謨納婆納伐底喃怛他揭多一弶伽捺地婆盧迦二俱胝那庾多設多索訶薩囉喃三唵引四普怖哩五折里尼六折哩慕上哩忽哩七社邏跋上哩莎引訶八若依此法而受持者。
translated: If one upholds this method,
the six pāramitās will all be fulfilled.

original: 是則同造九十九億百千那由他恒河沙等七寶塔已。
analyzed: 是則同造九十九億百千那由他恒河沙等七寶塔已。
translated: It is the same as having built ninety-nine koṭis of nayutas of Ganges sands of seven-jeweled stupas.

original: 是則供養九十九億百千那由他如來應正等覺。
analyzed: 是則供養九十九億百千那由他如來應正等覺。
translated: It is the same as having made offerings to ninety-nine koṭis of nayutas of Tathāgatas, Arhats, and Samyaksaṃbuddhas.
All with the great offering clouds of the devas.
Various adornments and celestial palaces.
Celestial offering implements are used for making offerings.

original: 彼諸如來皆悉憶念此善男女。
analyzed: 彼諸如來皆悉憶念此善男女。
translated: Those Tathāgatas all remember these good men and women.

original: 令其當得廣大善根福德之聚。
analyzed: 令其當得廣大善根福德之聚。
translated: Causing them to attain vast wholesome roots and the accumulation of blessings and virtues.
If there are those who, with this king of spells,
Write it according to the Dharma, uphold it, recite it,
Make offerings, and respectfully wear it on their bodies.
By the power of the spell, they will be protected.
Causing all enemies and their allies,

original: 一切夜叉羅剎富單那等。
analyzed: 一切夜叉羅剎富單那等。
translated: All yakṣas, rākṣasas, and pūtanās,
Will not be able to do evil to this person.
Each will be filled with fear and flee in all directions.
If there are those who can converse with that person,
They will also be able to eliminate the five heinous crimes.
If there are those who hear this person's voice,
Or are in their shadow or touch their body,

original: 令彼一切宿障重罪皆得消除。
analyzed: 令彼一切宿障重罪皆得消除。
translated: It will cause all their heavy karmic offenses from past lives to be eradicated.
All poisons will be unable to harm them.
Fire will be unable to burn them, water will be unable to drown them.
Evil spirits will be unable to take advantage of them.
Thunder, lightning, and hail will be unable to frighten or disturb them.
They will always be empowered by all Buddhas.
All Tathāgatas will comfort and protect them.
Celestial good spirits will increase their power.
They will not be bound by other spells.

original: 是故應當於一切處求此呪法。
analyzed: 是故應當於一切處求此呪法。
translated: Therefore, one should seek this dhāraṇī method everywhere.
After writing it, place it in a stūpa on the main road.
Allow sentient beings who come and go,
Down to birds, beasts, moths, flies, and ants,
To forever leave all hells.
And all evil paths, and be reborn in the celestial palaces.
Always remember past lives until reaching the stage of nonretrogression.

original: 爾時佛告除蓋障菩薩摩訶薩。
analyzed: 爾時佛告除蓋障菩薩摩訶薩。
translated: At that time, the Buddha told the Bodhisattva Mahāsattva Nivaraṇaviṣkambhin,

original: 執金剛主四王帝釋梵天王等。
analyzed: 執金剛主四王帝釋梵天王等。
translated: the Lord of the Vajra, the Four Heavenly Kings, Śakra Devānām Indra, the Heavenly King of Brahmā, and others,

original: 及其眷屬那羅延天摩醯首羅等言。
analyzed: 及其眷屬那羅延天摩醯首羅等言。
translated: and their retinues, Nārāyaṇa, Maheśvara, and so forth, saying,

original: 善男子我以此呪法之王付囑汝等。
analyzed: 善男子我以此呪法之王付囑汝等。
translated: Good sons, I entrust this king of mantra methods to you all.
You should protect and uphold it, and protect it.
Carry it on your shoulders, store it in a precious casket,
and in the future, do not let it be cut off.
You should hold it well and protect it well.
Give it to all sentient beings in the later world,
so that they may see and hear it and be free from the five heinous crimes.
At that time, the Bodhisattva Nivaraṇaviṣkambhin,

original: 執金剛主四王帝釋梵天王那羅延天摩醯首羅及天龍八部等。
analyzed: 執金剛主四王帝釋梵天王那羅延天摩醯首羅及天龍八部等。
translated: the Lord of the Vajra, the Four Heavenly Kings, Śakra Devānām Indra, the Heavenly King of Brahmā, Nārāyaṇa, Maheśvara, and the eight groups of gods, dragons, and others,
all bowed at the Buddha's feet and spoke in unison, saying,
We have already been blessed by the World-Honored One.
We have been given this mantra method and the method of building stupas.

original: 咸皆守衛住持讀誦書寫供養。
analyzed: 咸皆守衛住持讀誦書寫供養。
translated: We will all guard, uphold, recite, copy, and make offerings to it.
In order to protect all sentient beings.

original: 於後時分令彼眾生悉得聞知。
analyzed: 於後時分令彼眾生悉得聞知。
translated: In the future, may those sentient beings all be able to hear and know it.
Do not fall into the hells and other evil destinies.
We, in order to repay the great kindness of the Tathāgata,
Will all together protect and spread it widely.
Respecting and venerating it as if it were no different from the Buddha.
Do not allow this Dharma to be destroyed.
The Buddha said, Excellent, excellent!
You are able to firmly protect and uphold
The dhāraṇī Dharma in this way.

original: 時諸大眾聞佛說已歡喜奉行。
analyzed: 時諸大眾聞佛說已歡喜奉行。
translated: When the great assembly heard what the Buddha said, they joyfully undertook to practice it.
